physical_examinations.vital_signs: Calcium levels: 9.64 to 11.4 mg/dL; Phosphate: 1.62 mmol/L; PTH: 12 pg/mL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Breathing difficulties due to micrognathia and bilateral choanal stenosis; hypertelorism; elongated high arched palate; downsloping palpebral fissures; large open fontanelles with widely spaced sagittal sutures; palpable rachitic rosary.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Serum calcium increased to upper normal range with associated hypercalciuria.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Serum calcium level of 10.5 mg/dL; PTH: <4 pg/mL; Phosphate: 0.81 mmol/L
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Maximal adult height: 116.9 cm; severe and recurrent alignment abnormalities of legs; multiple osteotomies; kyphoscoliosis.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Serum calcium level remained high during childhood but normalized in adulthood; hypercalciuria persisted.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Maximal adult height: 133 cm; severe kidney disease with nephrocalcinosis; marked bilateral renal calcifications.
